abilities.name: Delta Protection
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Camerupt by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that has δ on its card is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
